column5: Turtle A: The condo has recently been renovated including new vinyl laminate flooring, countertops, 2 flat screen 40' and 42' screen TV's & DVD players . All appliances include washer, dryer, dishwasher and stove help insure a wonderful vacation time. Turtle A:New Reno!Min. to Beach,Coast View,Schlitterbahn, Wifi, Gym,Pool,Sauna,
